meanings.definition: to put on (a piece of clothing)
meanings.sent1: She donned her favorite dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: He donned his coat before heading out into the cold.
meanings.sent3: The cat donned a tiny hat and pretended to be a magician.
meanings.sent4: The city donned a blanket of snow overnight.
meanings.sent5: They donned their superhero capes and saved the day.

meanings.definition: to assume or take on (an appearance or role)
meanings.sent1: The actor donned a disguise to sneak past the guards.
meanings.sent2: She donned a serious expression when discussing the issue.
meanings.sent3: The dog donned sunglasses and tried to act cool.
meanings.sent4: The forest donned a mysterious aura as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: He donned the persona of a detective to solve the case.
